name: sands - broken sands of a broken sea
description:
you cannot tame the broken sands of a broken sea to be in the coordinate system that you had created. 

-this is the first of a three piece-animation collection created by manipulating a picture of sands which are one of the unseen elements of a temporary world. after this collection, the next theme is clouds. 
keep your eyeZ open to see what we'll be showing.

all is temporary.

animation by: eyzget
